summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Squid Game themed cryptocurrency lottery application. All backend APIs functional, frontend UI loads correctly with proper theming, countdown timer shows 43+ days remaining, navigation works, and responsive design implemented successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Console warnings about Reown Config fetch failures
minor_issues.impact: Non-critical - wallet connection still works with local/default values

passed_tests: Home page loads with Squid Game theme
Navigation between pages (Home, Join, My Entries)
Squid Game color scheme applied correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - 1 minor CSS selector issue in test script)

action_item_for_E1: No critical issues found. Application is working excellently. Minor console warnings about Reown Config can be addressed by updating wallet connection configuration, but functionality is not impacted.
